TopicTitle: Flight Controls Mode not saved to save file

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.3.2 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 10.0.22631 | CPU: AMD Ryzen 5 7600X | GPU: RX 6800 XT | RAM: 32GB

 

The active vessel's current Flight Controls Mode (Normal/Docking) is not correctly saved to the save file, it is always saved as "Normal".

As far as I know, the active vessel's VesselComponent.flightControlsMode is never updated when we press the Flight Controls Mode key, nor are the other fields that should store this value. One of these field might be serialized into the save file and as they are not updated the wrong flight control mode is saved.
